sentences.en: Capitalization: Make sure all letters are properly capitalized.
sentences.cn: 大写: 请确保所有字母的大小写正确.

sentences.en: China's total stock - market capitalization is about $ 2.23 trillion.
sentences.cn: 中国股市总市值在2.23万亿美元左右.

sentences.en: English - speaking instant messengers also refuse to burden themselves with punctuation and capitalization.
sentences.cn: 说英语的网上聊天者为了省事还拒绝使用标点符号和大写字母.

sentences.en: In addition, most our holdings are big capitalization stocks with good liquidity.
sentences.cn: 此外, 我们持有的大多数投资项目是大市值、流动性良好的股票.

sentences.en: Investors value that accomplishment at $ 168 billion ( the company's market capitalization ).
sentences.cn: 投资商们估计该公司的销售业绩已经达到了1680亿美元 ( 市场资本 ).

sentences.en: Is the index capitalization weighted or price weighted?
sentences.cn: 它是资本加权指数还是价格加权指数?

sentences.en: Land rent capitalization is land resource cost - raw land cost.
sentences.cn: 其实现形式为地租,地租资本化即为土地资源价格 - 生地价.

sentences.en: Microsoft and Oracle, for example, command massive market capitalization in stock market.
sentences.cn: 举个例子.微软和甲骨文, 在股票市场引导著大规模资本运作.

sentences.en: Our market capitalization is at an all - time high.
sentences.cn: 现在我们公司的资本市场总额已经是有史以来最高的了.

sentences.en: Program management is the focus of the fourth part of the course where issues of program design, operations and capitalization will be reviewed.
sentences.cn: 本课程的第四部分会着重于项目管理的讲解，在这部分的讲解中会回顾一下项目设计、运作和资本化等问题。

sentences.en: The sequence can be important, and sometimes even capitalization matters.
sentences.cn: 顺序很重要, 有时甚至连大小写问题也不例外.

sentences.en: The United States contributed approximately 35 percent of the World Bank's original $ 9.1 thousand - million capitalization.
sentences.cn: 在世界银行最初的91亿美元资金中,约35%是由美国提供的.

sentences.en: The world's artwork market capitalization is overwhelming tide and trend.
sentences.cn: 世界艺术品市场的资本化是势不可挡的潮流和趋势。

sentences.en: This book teaches through questions about the mechanics of capitalization and punctuation, grammar, sentence structure, paragraph development, and essay questions.
sentences.cn: 这本书教的问题，通过对力学的资本化和标点符号，语法，句子结构，段发展， 征文提问。

sentences.en: This high initial capitalization is rapidly amortized in the well managed high - density orchard.
sentences.cn: 在管理好的高密植果园里,这个最初的高额成本可以很快收回.

sentences.en: This value is called the capitalization of the company.
sentences.cn: 这种价值称为公司的股本.

sentences.en: Use ordinary capitalization . ALL CAPS is equivalent to shouting in e - mail .
sentences.cn: 使用一般的写法. 所有的美团人民 电子邮件 中称呼都是相等的.

sentences.en: When it was founded, members were required to subscribe to its capitalization.
sentences.cn: 在创办时, 它要求成员国认购股份,提供资本金.

words.tran_cn: 首都，省会；资金；大写字母；资本家
用大写字母书写；投资于
使资本化；以大写字母写；估计…的价值
